patthana8.66:1.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.66:2.1: Nanaupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.66:3.1: Naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.66:4.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
